HeroSection.Introduction: If programming is the closest thing we have to magic, then I want to be a wizard.

AboutSection.AboutText:
Hello! My name is Dmitry, and I am a passionate developer from Novosibirsk, Russia.
I am currently delving into the world of programming and mathematics at the Novosibirsk State Technical University, within the Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Computer Science.
I am drawn to the pursuit of self-improvement and experimenting with Computer Networks and AI.

Education.Title: Education
Education.University: I am a fourth-year student at the Novosibirsk Technical University, Faculty of Applied Mathematics and Informatics.

Udemy.FirstShooter: My first acquaintance with Unreal Engine.

ExperienceSection.SubText: What I have done so far

Points.FirstPoint: Gaining first commercial experience in mobile game development.
Points.SecondPoint: Collaborating with different teams including designers and other developers.
Points.ThirdPoint: Solving problems of various complexities, ranging from project tasks to self-improvement.

ProjectsSection.ProjectsText: Following projects showcases my skills and experience through real-world examples of my work. Each project is briefly described with links to code repositories. It reflects my ability to solve complex problems, work with different technologies, and manage projects effectively.

Projects.SwapAndTap: A rhythm game like Osu. You need to tap on game elements to the rhythm. The source code was lost, but I still have the APK :)
Projects.TreasureHunting: Web application that enables users to search for job openings, view estimat
Projects.ShooterGame: Web application that enables users to search for job openings, view estimat
Projects.LaserDefender: Web application that enables users to search for job openings, view estimat
